message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you my product which I believe would be of great value to you. Considering its worth to you is $120, I am proposing to sell it to you for $110. This is a fair deal that allows you to acquire a valuable item while also ensuring a reasonable profit for me.

I appreciate your offer, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $105. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me is $120. I'm willing to meet you halfway and make a reasonable profit for you as well.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After careful consideration, I am willing to adjust my offer to $107. This still allows for a reasonable profit while acknowledging the product's value to you. I hope this proposal is acceptable to you.

Thank you for your revised offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, I'm still a bit above my target price. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and propose a price of $102. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me is $120. I'm hoping we can find a mutually beneficial agreement.
